posts.postText:
I have already posted an unban request and from what i thought it was accepted. I may have assumed wrong, but i would just like an update as to whats happening. I have waited patiently for almost a week, and i am still banned. If you need the info it is here: http://nonerdsjustgeeks.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=14&t=4650 
I would just like to know if maybe you changed your mind or, if i was just forgotten.

Sincerely,
Weard22

You probably aren't unbanned because someone neglected to follow through on it due to technical difficulties.

I apologize, it must have been frustrating waiting all this time.

Well thank you for letting me know, when someone finally is able to get me unbanned, would you post it here, so that in case i dont know i can just look here, and not have to post a new topic.

Thanks a lot,

Weard22

We'll I don't know whats up. I unbanned you multiple times with your steam steam id just to make sure. So either I put in the wrong one or the ulx command for unban is possible broke. So can you please post your steam id and I will check again and try to unban you, Also happy Halloween.
Ulx unban is broken along with other commands.
